Job

28 Mar 2018

Welp, I got the job. Honestly I'm kind of angry about it, it seems so unfair. I am heavily underqualified, and have no relevant work experience. I didn't even actively apply, the company reached out to me and asked me to apply. But I got the job anyway. I don't deserve it at all.
